00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"

00027 namespace Hypertable { namespace Config {
00028 
00029 void init_command_shell_options() {
00030   CommandShell::add_options(cmdline_desc());
00031 }
00032 
00033 void init_master_client_options() {
00034   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00035     ("master", str()->default_value("localhost:38050"),
00036         "master server to connect in <host:port> format")
00037     ;
00038   // hidden aliases
00039   alias("master-host", "Hypertable.Master.Host");
00040   alias("master-port", "Hypertable.Master.Port");
00041 }
00042 
00043 void init_master_client() {
00044   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("master"));
00045   bool defaulted = properties->defaulted("master");
00046   properties->set("master-host", e.host, defaulted);
00047   properties->set("master-port", e.port, !e.port || defaulted);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void init_range_server_client_options() {
00051   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00052     ("range-server", str()->default_value("localhost:38060"),
00053         "range server to connect in <host:port> format")
00054     ;
00055   // hidden aliases
00056   alias("rs-port", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port");
00057 }
00058 
00059 void init_range_server_client() {
00060   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("range-server"));
00061   bool defaulted = properties->defaulted("range-server");
00062   properties->set("rs-host", e.host, defaulted);
00063   properties->set("rs-port", e.port, !e.port || defaulted);
00064 }
